protocols.Paper_title: Re-directing bacterial microcompartment systems to enhance recombinant expression of lysis protein E from bacteriophage φX174 in Escherichia coli
Re-directing bacterial microcompartment systems to enhance recombinant expression of lysis protein E from bacteriophage φX174 in Escherichia coli
protocols.Provenance: Page 4, 'Whole cell SDS-PAGE and Western blot': membranes blocked with 0.1% (v/v) Tween20 in TBS (blocking buffer for Western blot; not explicitly stated as lysis).

protocols.Paper_title: Re-directing bacterial microcompartment systems to enhance recombinant expression of lysis protein E from bacteriophage φX174 in Escherichia coli
protocols.Provenance: Page 4, 'Isolation of BMCs': cell pellets resuspended in 60% BPER-II and lysed (French press); multiple centrifugations and wash step reported. Abstract/Page 1 and Page 5 mention Empigen BB used during purification; Page 5 'Purification of E...' explicitly adds EBB detergent to lysate supernatant.
